texts.name: Phindara
texts.biography: Phindara, though an Elf, possesses an uncanny resistance to the gaze of a Basilisk, which has allowed her to control these creatures better than anyone else, including legendary Bron.

specialty.description:
{Basilisk Riders}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Basilisk Riders or Basilisk Champions for each level attained after 5th level.
specialty.name: Basilisk Riders
